addToDictionary.description: Link shown in the popup to accept a word to the internal dictionary

addToDictionaryTitle.description: Title hover shown in the popup to accept a word to the internal dictionary

appDesc.description: The description of the application, displayed in the web store.
appDesc.message: Check your texts for style and grammar problems everywhere on the web

appStoreDesc10.description: Description paragraph 1 in Google Chrome Web Store (does not appear in the extension itself)
appStoreDesc10.message: With this extension you can check text with the free style and grammar checker LanguageTool. LanguageTool finds many errors that a simple spell checker cannot detect, like mixing up there/their, a/an, or repeating a word, and it can detect some grammar problems. It supports more than 25 languages, including English, Spanish, French, German, Polish, and Russian.

appStoreDesc20.description: Description paragraph 2 in Google Chrome Web Store (does not appear in the extension itself)
appStoreDesc20.message: LanguageTool is designed with simplicity in mind. With the press of a button or customisable keyboard shortcut, LanguageTool instantly checks the spelling and grammar of any text that is selected. LanguageTool is compatible with almost all text, regardless of source, including social networks such as Twitter or LinkedIn and online e-mail services, such as Gmail. Very few sites like docs.google.com and chrome.google.com currently aren't supported - please use https://chrome.google.com/webstore/detail/languagetool/kjcoklfhicmkbfifghaecedbohbmofkm for Google Docs instead.

appStoreDesc30.description: Description paragraph 3 in Google Chrome Web Store (does not appear in the extension itself)
appStoreDesc30.message: With LanguageTool our aim is to give users a fully-featured grammar checker and proofreader that will enable them to have control and confidence over their content. While LanguageTool is a vital extension for non-native speakers, itâ€™s also smart enough to recognize mistakes that native speakers commonly make and it will improve your writing overall. This grammar and spelling correction works across all variations of common language; distinguishing between U.S. and British English, for instance. LanguageTool also features a personal dictionary for exceptions or words that you might commonly use but that are not found in a conventional dictionary. LanguageTool will recognize these words in future grammar checking and proofreading.

appStoreDesc40.description: Description paragraph 4 in Google Chrome Web Store (does not appear in the extension itself)
appStoreDesc40.message: Usage: Click in an editable field if you want to check its contents. Then click either on the icon in the lower right corner of the editable field, or on the LT icon which is displayed in your browser's toolbar in the upper right corner. Alternatively, use Ctrl+Shift+Space as a shortcut.

appStoreDesc60.description: Description paragraph 5 in Google Chrome Web Store (does not appear in the extension itself)
appStoreDesc60.message: Unlike Grammarly and Ginger, LanguageTool works for many languages and offers many of the same features.

appStoreDesc70.description: Description paragraph 6 in Google Chrome Web Store (does not appear in the extension itself)
appStoreDesc70.message: Your privacy is important to us: By default, this extension will check your text by sending it to https://languagetool.org over a securely encrypted connection. No account is needed to use this extension. We don't store your IP address. See https://languagetool.org/privacy/ for our privacy policy.

appStoreDesc80.description: Description paragraph 7 in Google Chrome Web Store (does not appear in the extension itself)

autoCheckDesc.description: Options dialog: auto-check on all domains by default
autoCheckDesc.message: Auto-check on all domains by default

autoCheckForOffThisDomainTitle.description: Hover title of the auto run button (appears when hovering over the blue reminder icon)
autoCheckForOffThisDomainTitle.message: Turn off auto check text for this domain

autoCheckForThisDomainTitle.description: Hover title of the auto run button (appears when hovering over the blue reminder icon)
autoCheckForThisDomainTitle.message: Auto check text for this domain

autoCheckOffDesc.description: Options dialog: auto-check off on this domain

autoCheckOnDesc.description: Options dialog: auto-check on this domain

autoCheckOnDomainsDesc.description: Options dialog: text for the textarea with the domains's where the check text will run automatically in background
autoCheckOnDomainsDesc.message: Auto-check text on these domains (one domain per line):

cancel.description: Link shown below the privacy note on first use

checkingProgress.description: Text shown in popup next to a spinning icon, indicating that the check is in progress

close.description: Text of large button at the bottom of the popup

contextMenuItem.description: Text shown in the context menu, if available.

contextMenuItemWithShortcut.description: Text shown in the context menu, if available. The parenthesis show the shortcut.

continue.description: Link shown below the privacy note on first use

couldNotCheckText.description: Error shown in the popup to indicate an error

couldNotLoginAtLTPlus.description: Error shown in the popup to indicate an error when user is using languagetoolplus.com
couldNotLoginAtLTPlus.message: Could not log in at languagetoolplus.com: please visit the options dialog of this add-on and make sure username and password are correct

defaultServerLink.description: Options dialog: Link to reset the URL of the API server to the default value

detectedLanguage.description: Text shown in the popup to indicate the automatically detected language of the text checked

dictionaryDesc.description: Options dialog: text for the textarea with the user's words to be ignored for spell checking
dictionaryDesc.message: Personal dictionary words (one word per line):

disableForThisDomainTitle.description: Hover title of the power switch button (appears when hovering over the blue reminder icon)
disableForThisDomainTitle.message: Turn off icon for this domain

domainsDesc.description: Options dialog: text for the textarea with the domains's where the reminder icon is disabled
domainsDesc.message: Disable on these domains (one domain per line):

foundAErrorOnCheckText.description: Show total errors on hover on reminder icon

foundErrorsOnCheckText.description: Show total errors on hover on reminder icon

freshInstallReload.description: Error shown when user has installed extension and called it on an already open tab but not reloaded that tab yet
freshInstallReload.message: If you have just installed or (re-)activated this extension, please reload the tab first in which you want to check a text.

freshInstallReload2.message: A page reload may also be necessary when the extension has just been updated in the background.

googleDocsNotSupported.description: Google Docs is too complex to be supported, so we show this error
googleDocsNotSupported.message: Sorry, Google Docs site is not supported by this extension. Please install this extension instead, which is optimized for Google Docs. After installation, use the 'Add-on' menu in Google Docs to access that extension.

havePremiumAccountDesc.description: Options dialog: checkbox for premium access

ignoreDomainsCheckDesc.description: Options dialog: text for the textarea with the domains's where the check text won't run automatically in background
ignoreDomainsCheckDesc.message: Don't auto-check on these domains (one domain per line):

ignoreQuotedLines.description: Options dialog: checkbox to exclude quoted text from checking
ignoreQuotedLines.message: Ignore lines starting with $char$ (typically quoted text)

ignoredRules.description: Text shown at the bottom of the popup to turn on turned off rules again
ignoredRules.message: These rules have been turned off, click a rule to turn it on again:

language.description: Text shown in the popup to indicate the automatically detected language of the text checked

motherTongueDesc.description: Options dialog: text next to the 'mother tongue' selection

motherTongueExpl.description: Options dialog: more descriptive text explaining what selection of mother tongue does
motherTongueExpl.message: Set mother tongue if you want to be warned about false friends when checking texts not written in your mother tongue.

networkError.description: Error message shown if API server could not be connected due to network issues

noErrorOnCheckText.description: Show total error on hover on maker icon

noErrorsFound.description: Text shown in the popup when the server found no potential errors in the text to check

noErrorsFoundFirstTimes.description: Text added after noErrorsFound on the first few checks
noErrorsFoundFirstTimes.message: Please note: LanguageTool is optimized to find errors that people actually make. So if you're just testing this add-on by entering some gibberish, it might not work well. Please use it for a few days on real text to see its value.

noReplacementPossible.description: Error message shown when the extension could not apply the suggestion selected by the user. May happen under some circumstances when editing HTML.
noReplacementPossible.message: Sorry, LanguageTool extension could not find error context in text

noReplacementPossible2.description: Error message shown when trying to replace an error with a suggestion in certain HTML that's not yet supported
noReplacementPossible2.message: Sorry, could not replace error with suggestion. This can happen when editing HTML.

noResponseFromServer.description: Error message if API server doesn't respond

noTextFound.description: Error message shown when no text was found

noTextFoundDetails.description: More detailed error message shown when no text was found
noTextFoundDetails.message: You don't seem to be inside a text area. If you're using an online office software, this add-on might not work there. Please check if the online office supports add-ons which provide support for LanguageTool.

noValidResponseFromServer.description: Error message shown we cannot parse API server response

placeCursor1.description: Error message shown when the extension button is clicked but cursor is not an editable field and there's no selection either.
placeCursor1.message: Please place the cursor in an editable field or select text (no active element in iframe found).

placeCursor2.description: Error message shown when the extension button is clicked but cursor is not an editable field and there's no selection either.
placeCursor2.message: Please place the cursor in an editable field or select text (active element: $elem$).

placeCursor3.description: Error message shown when the extension button is clicked but cursor is not an editable field and there's no selection either.
placeCursor3.message: Please place the cursor in an editable field or select text (no active element found).

premiumHint.description: Text shown in the popup to let the user know about the premium version
premiumHint.message: Get a more powerful version of LanguageTool at $link$ - it also works with this add-on

privacyNoteForDefaultServer.description: Shown on first start of extension to make user aware of privacy issues when using the default server on languagetool.org
privacyNoteForDefaultServer.message: This extension will check your text by sending it to $serverUrl$ over an encrypted connection. Your text will not be stored. For details, see our privacy policy.

privacyNoteForDefaultServer2.description: Shown on first start of extension to make user aware of privacy issues when using the default server on languagetool.org
privacyNoteForDefaultServer2.message: You can change the server in the add-on configuration. For example, you can also use a local server, if you have set up LanguageTool locally.

privacyNoteForOtherServer.description: Shown on first start of extension to make user aware of privacy issues when using some other than the default server
privacyNoteForOtherServer.message: This extension will check your text by sending it to $serverUrl$. To switch back to the default server, please visit the extension's options page.

privacyPolicy.description: Options dialog: Link to privacy policy

quotedLinesIgnored.description: Text shown in the popup to let the user know when parts of the text have been ignored
quotedLinesIgnored.message: Quoted lines starting with $char$ have been ignored

reactivateIcon.message: You've turned off the reminder icon for this domain, click here to re-activate it.

reminderIconTitle.description: Hover title of the blue reminder icon in the lower right corner of text areas

reviewRequest.description: Shown at the bottom of the popup dialog (for some users only)
reviewRequest.message: If you like this extension, why not write a review?

saveAsDefaultVariantMessage.description: Message near the link at popup which save manually selected language as default variant
saveAsDefaultVariantMessage.message: Click here to make $language$ your default variant

serverText.description: Options dialog: description of the text field for the API server URL

shortcutHint.description: Text shown in the popup to let the user know about the shortcut key combination
shortcutHint.message: You can trigger the text check with this shortcut: $shortcut$

shortcutHintDismiss.description: Link to let the user hide the hint about the shortcut

siteNotSupported.description: Some sites are too complex, so we show this error
siteNotSupported.message: Sorry, this site is not supported by this extension.

textCheckedBy.description: Text shown in the popup to make the user aware of which, possibly remote, service was used to check their text

textCheckedRemotely.description: Text shown in the popup to make the user aware of which remote service was used to check their text
textCheckedRemotely.message: Text checked remotely by languagetool.org

timeoutError.description: Error message shown if API server doesn't respond timely
timeoutError.message: Timeout from server - please try again later ($serverUrl$)

tooltip.description: Tooltip shown when hovering over the extension icon.
tooltip.message:
Check the current selection
or editable field with LanguageTool

turnOffRule.description: Link shown in the popup to turn off, i.e. ignore, a rule (the rule - not just this match)

username.description: Options dialog: user name for languagetoolplus.com

variantCaDesc.description: Options dialog: set the language variant

variantDeDesc.description: Options dialog: set the language variant

variantEnDesc.description: Options dialog: set the language variant

variantPtDesc.description: Options dialog: set the language variant

webstoreSiteNotSupported.description: Error shown when Chrome extension is used on https://chrome.google.com/webstore, which doesn't work for technical reasons
webstoreSiteNotSupported.message: Sorry, Google Chrome prevents extensions to access the Chrome Web Store. Strange, isn't it?
